welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ipoh, Malaysia! Get ready to be charmed by our city's colonial architecture, delicious street food, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ipoh has to offer.

restaurants.name: Miker Pizza
restaurants.description: Miker Pizza is a pizzeria located in Ipoh.
restaurants.address: No. 1, Jalan Tun Sambanthan, 30000 Ipoh, Perak

restaurants.address: 57-65, Jalan Verasamy (Off Horley Street), 30300 Ipoh, Perak

restaurants.name: Restoran Rahmatha
restaurants.description: Restoran Rahmatha is a halal restaurant located in Ipoh.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Chap Heng
restaurants.description: Restaurant Chap Heng is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.address: No. 30, Jln Tun Abdul Razak (Maxwell Road, Taman Cherry), 30100 Ipoh, Perak
